mapper.insert: /* memberInsert */ insert into member (mem_no, mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_name, mem_ask, mem_answer, mem_post, mem_address1, mem_address2, mem_mailCheck, mem_tel, mem_mail) values (member_seq.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pwd}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_ask}, #{mem_answer}, #{mem_post}, #{mem_address1}, #{mem_address2}, #{mem_mailCheck}, #{mem_tel}, #{mem_mail})
mapper.select: /* idCheck */ select nvl((select 1 from member where mem_id = #{mem_id}),0) as state from dual
/* termsList */ select ter_title, ter_content from terms
